messages.title: IT'S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: 1. At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority - or a hung parliament. 2. The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty. 3. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they're demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Politicians promised to enact the referendum result and it's time to keep that promise. As your MP I have always voted to leave, as the electorate decided, with a deal that will make our exit smoother and allow us to trade freely with Europe and the rest of the world in the future.

A Conservative government will keep the economy strong and increase funding for public services used by your family and mine. As your MP I have helped secure funding for a new railway station and secondary school in Kenilworth and a new medical centre in Wellesbourne.

Since Conservatives came to office in 2010, we have reduced greenhouse gases by a quarter, increased the percentage of our electricity from renewable sources from 6% to 35.5% and cut the number of plastic bags in use by 25 billion.

contactInformation.address: CC, Unit 2B, Provand Park, Bogot Street, Birmingham, B4 7A3

quotes.text: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance.
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.

examples: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.

Since Conservatives came to office in 2010, we have reduced greenhouse gases by a quarter, increased the percentage of our electricity from renewable sources from 6% to 35.5% and cut the number of plastic bags in use by 25 billion.
At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority - or a hung parliament.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
A Conservative government will keep the economy strong and increase funding for public services used by your family and mine.
As your MP I have helped secure funding for a new railway station and secondary school in Kenilworth.
As your MP I have helped secure funding for a new medical centre in Wellesbourne.
A Conservative government will keep the economy strong.

Since Conservatives came to office in 2010, we have reduced greenhouse gases by a quarter, increased the percentage of our electricity from renewable sources from 6% to 35.5% and cut the number of plastic bags in use by 25 billion.
Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance.
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
